text: Sós, Sos or Şoş (, its literal meaning in the Hungarian language being salty) is a Hungarian surname. It may refer to: *Csaba Sós (born 1957), retired Hungarian swimmer *Károly Sós (1909–1991), Hungarian footballer and manager *Márkó Sós (born 1990), Hungarian football player *Rozalia Șoș (born 1947), former Romanian handball player *Vera T. Sós (born 1930), Hungarian mathematician == References == == External links == Category:Hungarian- language surnames
title: Sós
